Automatically Regenerate Installments flag.  Use this flag to automatically regenerate installments when Customer Contract Amendments are completed.

Automatically Submit Schedule via Contract Amendment flag. Use this flag to automatically submit the Revenue Recognition Schedule on Customer Contract Amendment completion after installments are automatically regenerated.

Automatically_Generate_Installments.description: If true, the Revenue Recognition Schedule will automatically generate installments after contract approval

Automatically_Regenerate_Installments.description: Automatically Regenerate Installments flag.  Use this flag to automatically regenerate installments when Customer Contract Amendments are completed.

Automatically_Submit_Schedule_for_Approv.description: Can only be true, if auto generate is true, then the installments will be automatically submitted for approval

Automatically_Submit_Schedule_via_Contra.description: Automatically Submit Schedule via Contract Amendment flag. Use this flag to automatically submit the Revenue Recognition Schedule on Customer Contract Amendment completion after installments are automatically regenerated.
